stimulusHtml: The experimental design allows testing of which of the following?

features.html: In a study on seed germination of radish seeds, five beakers were set up containing equal numbers of seeds. The beakers were subjected to the conditions indicated in the table below.

choicesHtml: Only the effect of temperature on germination
Only the need for oxygen for germination
Only the effect of light on germination
The effects of both temperature and oxygen on germination
The effects of both temperature and light on germination
